terms.definition: Comprehensive written materials that explain how to use, implement, or understand a product, including user guides, technical specifications, and help resources.
Professional writers who specialize in creating clear, concise documentation for technical products, software, and complex processes.
A centralized web-based platform that organizes and provides access to an organization's documentation, guides, and information resources.
Step-by-step instructional documents that help end users understand how to operate or use a specific product or software.
Detailed reference documents that provide comprehensive instructions, specifications, and troubleshooting information for a product.
Software as a Service - a cloud-based software delivery model where applications are hosted remotely and accessed via the internet.
A professional responsible for overseeing the development, strategy, and lifecycle of a product, including coordinating documentation efforts.
A role in agile development who defines product requirements, prioritizes features, and serves as the primary stakeholder representative.
Online software tools that allow teams to create, edit, collaborate on, and publish documentation from anywhere with internet access.
An agile project management framework that uses short development cycles and daily team meetings to improve collaboration and productivity.
A feature that tracks and displays all changes made to a document over time, showing who made edits and when they occurred.
Team members who have been granted access to collaborate on documentation projects within a shared digital workspace or platform.
A centralized website or platform that hosts and organizes all of an organization's documentation for easy access by users and customers.
The process of delegating specific documentation or project responsibilities to team members, often with deadlines and tracking capabilities.
A structured process that enables multiple team members to work together efficiently on documentation projects, with defined roles and communication channels.
